snippet.title: One Shell Straight to Hell X Layers of Fear - New Gameplay Trailer + Limited Free DLC Reveal
snippet.description:
❗Coming to Steam in Fall 2020❗ Wishlist today 👉 https://bit.ly/discover_OSSTH 👈

'One Shell Straight to Hell X Layers of Fear' is a crossover DLC between the famous psychological horror from Bloober Team and the top-down dungeon-crawling shooter featuring the most badass priest ever. You can only imagine what may happen when these two worlds collide and the bridge between one of the world’s favourite horrors and the voxelated Halliwell estate opens and the violence gets all arty.

***
ONE SHELL STRAIGHT TO HELL pits a heavily armed Padre Alexander against hordes of demons and the possessed in an isometric dungeon crawling, rogue-lite shooter with a heavy helping of base defence mechanics and a surly attitude. Developed by Shotgun with Glitters, ONE SHELL STRAIGHT TO HELL is a completely new spin on the art of exorcism and demon hunting.
***
More info about ONE SHELL STRAIGHT TO HELL on:
FACEBOOK - https://www.facebook.com/ThePadreGameOfficial
TWITTER - https://twitter.com/TheSinfulPadre
DISCORD - https://discord.gg/SZTPcfj
***
Follow Feardemic on:
WEBSITE - www.feardemic-games.com
NEWSLETTER - https://www.feardemic-games.com/newsletter-signup
STEAM - https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/feardemic
TWITTER - https://twitter.com/feardemic
FACEBOOK - https://www.facebook.com/Feardemic/
INSTAGRAM - https://www.instagram.com/feardemic/
